item.title: Cyber Security Analyst role & SOC
item.description: What role does the Cyber Security Analyst have? -implements and configures security controls -has a role in the SOC or CSIRT -auditing security processes and procedures (internal and external, ie: on 3rd parties ) -performing risk, vulnerability assesments and penetration tests and recommending appropriate security controls & procedures as a result -keep themselves informed & up-to-date so they can give threat intel,spread awareness and advice on legal, compliance and regulatory issues
